title: Hospitable Hotels in Begumpet Welcome Discerning Travellers (shobna malhotra)
text: By shobna malhotra Jul 23, 2015 For gracious living and a grand heritage, for a 'royal" city steeped in a rich cultural heritage where magnificent monuments, sacred temples and a melange of munificent arts, crafts and dance coalesce in an amazing amalgam of India's rich heritage, journey to Hyderabad and ensconce yourselves in hospitable hotels in Begumpet.Whether you choose to live in bustling Begumpet or in luxurious hotels in Hyderabad near Banjara Hills, there are many advantages for travellers in selecting such classy staying options. Hotels in Begumpet , situated close to the busy railway station and accessible from both the domestic and international airports and with easy access to Secunderabad main transit options, lie within a 6 km radius of the Ameerpet, Banjara Hills and Jubilee hills business district, which is of great significance for business travellers with work commitments in the area! With just a couple of easily traversed kilometres from the famous Hussain Sagar Lake, which separates the twin cities of Hyderabad and Secunderabad, its business viability is further enhanced. It allows for such savvy business visitors to de-stress and work out in leisurely comfort at the luxurious recreational facilities which include a fully equipped gymnasium and a sizeable area for indoor sports to keep guests healthy and in good physical condition.When you select to stay in hotels in Hyderabad near Banjara Hills , you automatically inherit a legacy of luxurious privileges. With spacious and elegantly furnished rooms and suites with contemporary chic and en-suite washrooms with bathtubs and classy bathroom amenities, you are all set for an enhanced stay!Each suite is luxurious in size with an executive business room, a private bedroom and a two-person bathroom, so you can carry out your ablutions at leisure and unwind in peace! The exclusive executive suite, with its stylishly appointed separate bedroom with ample space and a luxurious closet, a large flat surfaced television and working desk and living area furnished with plush couches, a dining table set for four, a well-stocked refrigerated mini-bar and a second television set, make for luxurious living!Such plush accommodation in hotels in Hyderabad near Banjara hills , with their luxurious feather mattresses and customized duvets, with marble floor bathrooms and walk-in glass shower cubicles, bathtub with spray jets, running hot and cold water, magnifying shaving mirrors, spoil you for choice!Luxurious accommodation in hotels in Begumpet , with pampering amenities like international and domestic direct dialling with voice mail, laptop friendly safes, large LCD TV with multi-port jack with cable connection, well-stocked attached butler's pantry, in-room pillow menu and high speed internet, comprehensively cover your multi-faceted needs! In the special suites, a special wellness area for in-room spa treatments and working gym, DVD player with English/Hindi movie listings and full service cable channels and appetizingly stacked gourmet corner, keep you replenished and replete! About the Author The author has stayed in several business and luxury hotels in India and is one of the foremost authorities on them. The author's articles are a good source for people looking for information about Hotels in Begumpet and hotels in Hyderabad near Banjara hills . Rating:
